She was wearing her school uniform like usual, and to your surprise she was actually wearing her glasses. This pleased you, as you always thought she looked much cuter with them, and you were disappointed when they were destroyed in her battle with Ryoko Asakura.

As Nagato approached you, she took off her shoes and socks, and placed them carefully to the side of the mat. You couldn't help but look down at her bare feet and think how cute they looked. Standing right in front of you, Nagato bowed politely and greeted you.

"Hello." She said simply.

"Um, hi..." You replied nervously, not knowing how to properly respond to such a cute girl.

"From what I understand, you wish to fight me. Is this correct?" Nagato asked, cutting straight to the point.

Nervously you nodded your head without saying a word.

"Very well. Please know that I will not hold back." Nagato said.

"O-of course not! It wouldn't be a fair fight if you didn't give it your all!" You replied.

This time Nagato was the one to nod without speaking.

You got into a fighting stance and focused all attention on Nagato. You were prepared for her to attack you immediately, but to your surprise she did nothing of the sort. She simply stood there, staring at you. Then, suddenly, her lips began to move as though she were chanting one of her "spells". "I modified the space within this room to be more advantageous to me. Within this space my physical strength is infinite, and you are immortal. This way I can go all out against you without worrying about killing you by accident."

"B-but that's cheating!"

"Incorrect. The only rule for these fights is that I must only use my body and the natural abilities it possesses. I am not using my powers to fight you, only to augment my own body. Ergo, I am within the rules."

You breathed a sigh of defeat as you realized that Nagato was right. It may be a loophole in the rules, but she technically was within the rules. She tried to dodge out of the way of your incoming punch, but you faked her out and tripped her up with a sweeping kick to her legs. Nagato stumbled as you swept her legs out from under her, but quickly righted herself and went on the offensive herself.

Nagato began to pepper you with a series of incredibly fast yet fairly weak jabs. You weren't fast enough to avoid her barrage, so you simply put your arms up to guard against the blows. You waited, enduring Nagato's onslaught of rapid punches, until finally you saw the opening that you needed. The moment there was a gap between her blows, you ducked out of the way and popped up with a fierce uppercut, slamming Nagato's chin and knocking her back.

Pressing your advantage, you took Nagato's strategy and began peppering her with as many quick jabs as you could. Not giving her a chance to recover, you quickly kicked her and knocked her away. Nagato simply stood there, panting from exhaustion. A confident grin spread across your face. After the one-sided massacre that she had done to you before, you finally had the upper hand against this cute alien girl.

Just when you thought you were about to win, however, Nagato dashed toward you out of nowhere. Expecting her to attack you head on, you put your arms up to defend yourself again. Unfortunately for you, this was a mistake. Rather than attacking directly, Nagato jumped into the air and came down with her legs wrapping around your neck.

In that instant, any hope of winning you had was snuffed out. Nagato's slender legs constricted tighter and tighter around your neck by the second, cutting of your air and severely limiting your ability to fight back. As you felt those surprisingly powerful legs strangling you, you couldn't help but think of how easily she could've decapitated you with this move had she done it in the previous round with her infinite strength.

"I have won again. Tap out now and surrender or I will continue to hurt you." Nagato said, still sounding emotionless as ever.

You couldn't believe that this was happening. Not now, when you were so close to finally winning against her! Could this girl seriously not be defeated?! You didn't want to surrender. You wanted to keep fighting and hope to somehow escape from this hold that Nagato had you in. However, your lungs were rapidly running out of air, and if you kept wasting your energy in a futile struggle against her, Nagato would surely make you pass out before you could do anything of worth to fight back.

In the end...

154311.content:
Your mind wandered as you tried to decide whose name to right down. After a bit of thought, your thoughts turned to an anime that you had seen recently: The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya. More specifically, you were thinking of Mikuru Asahina, the time traveler and token moe character of the show. She was an incredibly cute girl, very nice, and she didn't seem to possess any particular physical skills.

Fighting her would surely be an easy win, and being able to get up close to a girl as cute as her would be a nice bonus too. Without another though, you wrote her name down. Then you remembered that two different versions of Mikuru had appeared in the show, so in parentheses next to her name, you wrote 'the younger one'.

"Ohoho.The young Mikuru Asahina, eh? Good choice, good choice. Unless of course you picked her fpr no reason other than to get an easy win... If that's the case, then I think you'll be sorely disappointed." The old man said.

Before you could reply and ask him what he meant by that, you found yourself teleported to a large mostly-empty room. There was nothing else in sight aside from a large foam mat in the center, and her. Standing there in the corner of the room, dressed in the cute maid outfit that she wore so often in the SOS brigade club room, was your opponent: Mikuru Asahina. As you approached her, you saw her jump a little as she heard you coming. She then turned around quickly and greeted you.

"H-hello there... I... Are you my next opponent?" Mikuru asked, her voice sounding so cute and nervous.

"Yep. I'm ready whenever you are." You replied, walking toward the mat in the center of the room.

"O-okay... Then let's start immediately!" Mikuru said, following you to the mat and standing on the opposite side.

Out of nowhere you heard a bell ring to signal the start of your match.

Immediately you charged toward Mikuru with the intention of pinning her to the ground. You didn't expect her to be able to do much to stop you. After all, Haruhi had practically molested her numerous times within the anime. If she were able to fight back, why would she have put up with that?

Of course, with those thoughts in mind, what happened next surprised you greatly. As you came close to Mikuru, she closed her eyes nervously and quickly spun around, kicking you in the shoulder and knocking you to the ground. As you clutched your shoulder in pain, you looked up in shock at Mikuru to see her holding her hand in front of her mouth shyly.

Shaking off the pain, you got to your feet again and prepared to charge her again. As you reached out to grab her, Mikuru swiftly moved to grab your wrist and toss you over her shoulder. Once again you simply laid there in shock. How was this happening?! Mikuru, the defenseless moe-blob, was actually beating you! This had to be a fluke... There was no way she was this skilled at fighting.

Once again you got to your feet to charge her, and once again Mikuru countered your attack effortlessly, as if by instinct. This time you grabbed your wrist and twisted your arm behind your back. You groaned in pain as she held you there, unable to move.

"Oh, does this hurt too much? I'm sorry!" Mikuru said nervously, loosening her grip on your arm and allowing you to wrench yourself free.

Immediately you jumped backward to get some distance from her.

"How? How are you so good?! I didn't even know you were able to fight!" You said.

"I-it was a part of my training to prepare me to travel back in time and meet Miss Suzumiya. In my time crime is regulated to a virtually non-existent level, but in her time things weren't so peaceful. In order to make sure I would be safe and able to complete my mission, I was taught several different forms of self defense. Anything beyond that is classified information." Mikuru replied to you.

You couldn't believe what you just heard. All this time, the helpless little Mikuru Asahina was actually a master of numerous martial arts. No wonder you couldn't even touch her. If she had been trained to be able to fend off experienced criminals, then she could mop the floor with you easily! But if she was this skilled at fighting all along, then why did she just submit to Haruhi's abuse without ever trying to resist?!

"One more question. Why did you always let Haruhi toy with you? If you could defend yourself like this, then why didn't you?" You asked her, dying to know the answer.

As soon as you said this, tears started to well up in Mikuru's eyes. It was as though your question had reawakened some dormant trauma caused by all the times she was molested by Haruhi.

"I... I had no other choice... Miss Suzumiya's powers are too unpredictable. If I fought back and she got angry, then it could cause a global catastrophe. There's no telling how she would react, so I had to play it safe and let her have her way. I had to let her do all those terrible things to me." Mikuru said through her tears.

Now you felt terrible for making such a cute girl cry like this.

"I'm sorry, Mikuru. I shouldn't have brought up something like that. I should've known that you wouldn't want to talk about it." You said.

Mikuru wiped her eyes and smiled at you.

"No, it's okay... You couldn't have known... It's not your fault. Anyway, we have a fight to finish!" Mikuru said, her voice now sounding much more confident.

"Are you sure you want to do this? If you don't want to, I can always just give you the win and fight someone else..."

"No, it's fine, really! Truth be told, I never actually got the chance to use any of the techniques I learned until now. Fighting you like this... Not holding anything back... I don't know why, but it's actually really exciting!"

"So you're having fun then, Mikuru?"

"Yes! I don't think I've ever felt this good before!"

"Well in that case, let's keep going! I've still got plenty of fight left in me!" You said, determined to somehow pull out a win.

"Don't expect me to go easy on you. I'm giving this everything I've got too!" Mikuru said, smiling at you cheerfully as she got into a fighting stance.


What happens next?

1543112.content:
Without hesitating, you quickly dashed toward Mikuru one more time. Just like your previous attempts, you saw her moving instinctively to intercept your attack and counter you. However, this time you were well aware of what she was capable of. She no longer was able to catch you off guard with her surprising levels of skill. You knew she would be able to counter anything you did if you tried to attack her directly. And that's why you decided to try something different this time. You had to fake her out.

As Mikuru reached forward to grab your arm, you quickly stopped advancing toward her and jumped to the side. Mikuru stumbled for a moment as her fingers only managed to grasp at thin air. Taking that opportunity, you quickly slid between Mikuru's legs and jumped to your feet behind her. Mikuru tried to turn around and face you, but you acted too quickly. Not giving her a chance to react, you wrapped your arms around her waist, pinning her arms to her sides in the process.

Shocked that you managed to get the upper hand, Mikuru struggled desperately to break free of your grip. Unfortunately, for as skilled a fighter as she was, you had a clear advantage over her in terms of raw physical strength. As long as you held her like this, she couldn't do anything. Realizing that she was trapped, Mikuru began to whimper nervously. Her mind was filled with thoughts of what Haruhi had done to her before, and immediately she began to think of you doing things even worse.

Even if you had been nice to her before, you were still a guy. And in a situation where you held such a cute girl helpless to resist you, there was no telling what kinds of perverted things you would do to take advantage of the situation. Of course, you had no intention of doing any of these things. You were only focused on the fight. But how was Mikuru to know that when she couldn't even see your face right now. She was just too worried about what might happen, she wasn't thinking things through rationally. She was afraid, and in her mind, she began to cry out for help.

Just then, a blinding light flashed before your eyes. In shock, your grip on Mikuru loosened, and she managed to squirm free. Running to the other side of the fighting mat, she stood there with a nervous expression still fresh on her face. The two of you then turned your attention to the orb of light that was floating between you. Within a few seconds, the light faded, and in its place stood an astoundingly beautiful figure: the adult version of Mikuru Asahina! But why was she here?!

"Sorry to interrupt your little game, but I can't let this continue. You winning this fight caused the younger me to develop a severe fear of men, and it has traumatized me for years. I'm sick of living my life in fear of men, so I decided to step in and stop the cause of the problem from happening. If you want to win against her, you'll have to go through me first!" The older Mikuru said with her hands on her hips.

"Y-you're me? F-from even further into the future than I'm from?" The younger Mikuru asked nervously.

"Yes, dear, I'm your future self. And you don't need to worry about him anymore, because I'm here to help you win this fight. Together there's no way we can lose." The older Mikuru said, giving her younger self a comforting hug to calm her down.

The two Mikurus then turned their attention back to you. You were starting to get nervous as the older one stared you down like a mother bear protecting its cub, and the younger one regained her confidence as she dusted herself off. You knew there was no way of winning this. One Mikuru was bad enough, but two? You didn't stand a chance now! Before you knew what had hit you, both Mikurus were already on top of you.


But what position were they in?

Her psychopathic tendencies would have terrified you had you watched further into the series to see them.

155332222212121.content:
So you decided to fight against the beautiful, blond-haired (and maybe a little bit sadistic) Android 18. Marching through the door into the fighting room you see her standing there, dressed in the exact same clothes she wore during the World Tournament in the Boo-saga (http://th04.deviantart.net/fs70/PRE/f/20...).

"Hold it right there", she addresses you with a stern expression on her face. "Turn around and get out. You're way too weak to even think about taking me on. So do yourself a favor and leave."

You were pretty much puzzled by that, though she may be right considering your strength. Nevertheless, it's not always about winning, so you set up the best smile you could offer and responded : "Sorry, but I won't. As a matter of fact, I don't expect you to be stronger than me, on the contrary. You might be in for a real surprise."

"Hmpf, fine. Don't tell me afterwards I wouldn't have warned you", she says while taking off her shoes.
„Ehm, why are you taking off your shoes?“
„Because I would not want to break your jaw with one kick. Maybe it helps,“ she responds with a slight grin on her face. And she definitely wasn't all talk. In the blink of an eye she rushes over to you and smacks you right in the face with her slender, orange-socked foot, crushing you against the room's wall. The impact deflates your lungs instantly, you go down on your knees, struggling for air.

„Oh, so you survived that one. Quite surprising“, you hear her voice coming from directly in front of you. As you raise your head to look her in the eyes, she smacks you again right in the face with her left sole, pressing you hard against the brick wall.
„Do you you already regret not leaving as I told you to? Or are you a maso?“ You can't answer that one, since her foot is pressed straight in your face. Of course you thought it would be kinda sexy fighting with a beautiful woman like her, but this is definitely too much, both in terms of pain and humiliation. So you raise your hands and try to pull her foot off of your face, but to no avail. It doesn't even budge one inch.
„Haha, struggle how much you want, there is no chance for you to escape now.“ And she makes that clear as hell. Just for a moment, she raises her foot up, but only to put it against your throat, choking you with force. Your vision becomes blurry, darkness overcomes your eyes.

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Next

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
There are too many to choose from in this show so either pick a monster girl of your choosing or we move on to another series.
The next series of choice will be Yuuna and the Haunted Hotsprings.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Who else can I fight

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
What about this series?

Sure, the lovely ladies don't get much focus, but they are quite lovely.

Heck, Two easy choices are Mount Lady who is an attention whore, and 18+ Only Hero: Midnight, whose power is to produce a sleep-inducing aroma from her body.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: Boku no Hero Academia/ My Hero Academia

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Alright, let's go through the list of ladies.


There's 18+ Only Hero: Midnight ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...
, Midnight for short.

Her power is to produce a knockout gas from her body, thus needing her to wear clothes that tend to be scantily clad.

She wears clothes that make her look like a dominatrix, and tends to act like it. She does like to teach.

However, she does not like anyone calling her old and unmarried.

===

There's Mount Lady ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...


She is an attention whore who has the ability to change her height from 5.3 feet tall to 67 feet tall. She cannot change her height from any other size or make only one part of her body grow.

If she could, she'd probably make her boobs forever be bigger than any other woman.

She's also kind of lazy outside of being a hero. So if she decides to enslave you, you'd do all of her chores.

===

And then there's Pixie-Bob ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...
.

A member of the Wild, Wild Pussycats. Her quirk is to manipulate the Earth.

She's self-conscious about her age and has a taste for younger men, seeking to find one to marry.

So if you fight and lose, you might become her boyfriend... or a slave that she publicly claims her boyfriend.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: My Hero Academia women

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
There's Ochaco Uraraka ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...
.

She's a cutie who doesn't have a bad bone in her body, though she does get aggressive and reckless at times.. Her quirk is to manipulate gravity.

however, she is trying to make life financially easier for her family, so if she enslaves you, she might pimp you out to other women. Either that, or you get to deal with her hidden feelings.

So you might wind up dealing with and Ochaco who is flirty, suggestive, and dominating.

===

This one is no surprise.

Tsuyu Asui ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...


Her quirk to to have frog-like abilities and even having some-what of an appearance of one.

She tends to be blunt with her words, but she means well.

She also is quite intelligent and is considered a perfect pillar of emotional support.

So she might merely enjoy you being her servant and you'd get to be her tool to relax with a quick wrestling match.

===

This one can make herself look like anyone, provided she has a sample of their blood.

Himiko Toga ▼
http://bokunoheroacademia.wikia.com/wiki...


She tends to overly focus on anyone who bleeds a lot, though sometimes, she just overly focuses on anyone who gets her attention.

However, she finds life difficult and wants to makes things easier for herself. So if you wind up becoming her slave, you'll probably wind up doing her chores with your reward being a impromptu wrestling match.

What her appearance would be in those matches, is a mystery.
1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.title: more ladies from Hero academia

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
There's this series, featuring squids and octopi in the form of girls and boys who can travel in ink like it was water.


There's Marie and Callie, the Squid Sisters ▼
https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/Squid_Sist...
pop duo and some of the hosts of the Inkopolis news, so your match might be advertised. Imagine being the first human in Inkopolis and one anyone can wrestle!

===

But if you prefer Octopi, then perhaps Marina and Pearl are more your style! They're a band called Off thew Hook ▼
https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/Off_the_Ho...
and they're also hosts of the Inkopolis news in Splatoon 2.


===

Agent 3 ▼
https://splatoonwiki.org/wiki/Agent_3
is the Inkling that the player controls. For the sake of the story, this one will be female. If you choose her, then she will recall how you played her.

If you had played well, then she might decide to keep you as a pet.

If you played poorly, then she will take her anger out on you.

If you never played, then why should she care how she treats someone who never gave her game a shot?

2. No disgusting stuff (Scat, unbirthing, etc)
3. No GTS or shrinking
4. You're referred to in the 2nd person
5. Moves STRONGLY encouraged by the anime babes: Facesitting (reverse/forward http://www.smother.de/preview/a/aline/aline-03-5.jpg), Headscissors (ESPECIALLY Reverse Headscissors: http://www.lethalbody.com/images/Free_tour_Galleries/Mixed_WrestlingTour/images/...)
6. All anime babes wear their outfits they were on the show. THEN the strip down to either their bra and panties or a bikini
